arts.ttl: Portsmouth boss waiting to learn full extent of latest frustrating injury set-back
arts.sum: Pompey are waiting to discover the outcome of the injury which ruled Jacob Farrell out of their Stoke debacle.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth skipper’s honest message to faithful after Stoke City night of humiliation
arts.sum: Skipper Marlon Pack admitted he was embarrassed to applaud the travelling Pompey fans after their Stoke City capitulation.

arts.ttl: 'Sensational centre forward performance' | Cannon scores FOUR against Portsmouth
arts.sum: Leicester City loanee Tom Cannon scores four goals for Stoke against Portsmouth on just his third appearance for The Potters.

arts.ttl: 'Massive apologies': Stunned Portsmouth boss' honest message to the Fratton faithful after Stoke debacle
arts.sum: John Mousinho issued an apology to the Pompey faithful after a Stoke humiliation.

arts.ttl: Narcis Pelach reveals pre-match pep talk for Tom Cannon before four-goal heroics
arts.sum: I said, 'Look I cannot be waiting for performances in the middle of a game, I have to do what is right for the team but I want to let you know that I am going to back you. But Pelach said: “We had a very nice chat this week because I replaced him the other day at half-time.
Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Stoke City and Portsmouth.

arts.ttl: Cannon scores four as Stoke hit Pompey for six
arts.sum: Tom Cannon scored four goals as Stoke thrashed Portsmouth 6-1 to give new boss Narcis Pelach an emphatic first Championship win as Potters boss.

arts.ttl: Stoke player ratings vs Portsmouth as Tom Cannon blasts off Narcis Pelach era
arts.sum: Tom Cannon became the first Stoke City player to score four goals in one match in 24 years as he fired Narcis Pelach to a crushing first victory as head coach. A couple of minutes before the break and the Potters were back ahead, a lovely weighted pass by Gallagher to Cannon to run diagonally behind the defence and slip past the keeper with his left foot.

arts.ttl: Stoke 6 Portsmouth 1: Neil Allen's verdict - Shocking Blues given relegation wake-up call after abject display
arts.sum: Tom Cannon, the loanee from Leicester City, will be declared Pompey’s chief destroyer, yet in truth the source of their destruction was an inside job.

arts.ttl: ‘Horror night’, ‘blitzed’, ‘all too much for him’: Jordan Cross’ Portsmouth ratings from shameful Stoke City debacle
arts.sum: The ratings are in from Pompey’s clash at Stoke City tonight.
